typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'xml',
	fileSystem: 'mi186003',
	folderPath: 'work',
	fileName: 'CustomersOrders.xml',
	validationMode: 'xsd',
	namespaces: true,
	namespacePrefixes: ['http://www.adventure-works.com'->'aw']) ~> xmlRead
xmlRead foldDown(skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
